vision.title: Vision
vision.description: To be the driving force for industrial innovation in the field of steel and castings, achieving global excellence in providing sustainable products and solutions that contribute to the development of the national economy and enhance the competitiveness of the Egyptian industry.

mission.title: Mission
mission.description: We strive to provide distinguished products of steel and castings to achieve customer satisfaction and enhance our competitive capabilities, and we work to utilize the latest technologies, develop our production capabilities, and commit to environmental and social responsibility, to ensure a sustainable future for the Egyptian industry.

strategy.title: General Company Strategy
strategy.intro: Delta Steel Factories implements its strategy based on its vision to be the driving force for industrial innovation in the field of steel and castings, achieving global excellence in providing sustainable products and solutions that contribute to the development of the national economy and enhance the competitiveness of the Egyptian industry.
strategy.commitment: The company is committed to implementing this strategy, which reflects its direction towards achieving industrial leadership and enhancing its role in supporting the Egyptian economy and building a sustainable industrial future based on excellence and responsibility.

quality.policyStatement: This policy is declared, published, and available to all stakeholders, including customers, suppliers, and regulatory bodies, to enhance transparency and trust.
quality.intro: Delta Steel Factories is one of the oldest companies producing steel, cast iron, and steel castings in Egypt and the Middle East, offering a wide range of products including steel billets, cast iron castings, and carbon steel castings.
quality.commitmentText: The company is committed to meeting customer requirements and needs to achieve their satisfaction and exceed their expectations, with full compliance with local and international laws and regulations related to quality, environment, and occupational health and safety, through establishing, documenting, and implementing integrated management systems that align with ISO 9001:2015, ISO 14001:2015, ISO 45001:2018 requirements, supporting the company's strategic direction and considering risks and opportunities associated with its administrative and industrial activities.
quality.review: The company periodically reviews this policy to ensure its continued relevance to its objectives and keep pace with changes in the market and legal requirements, with a focus on achieving continuous improvement in all its operations.
quality.sustainability: The company also affirms its commitment to protecting the environment and achieving sustainability by reducing the environmental impact of its industrial operations (such as gas emissions and solid waste) and complying with local and international environmental regulations, and ensuring a safe and healthy work environment for all employees through applying preventive measures to reduce occupational risks associated with iron and casting production, such as exposure to heat or heavy equipment.

ceoMessage.title: Word of the Managing Director and CEO
ceoMessage.name: Dr. Ayman Khalil Al-Saie
ceoMessage.position: Managing Director and CEO of Delta Steel Factories Company

paragraphs.1: I am pleased to welcome you to the official website of Delta Steel Factories, this ancient industrial edifice that represents one of the fundamental pillars of heavy industries in Egypt and the Middle East.
paragraphs.2: Over many decades, the company has contributed to supporting the industrial development journey and meeting the needs of many strategic sectors, most notably the railway sector, engineering industries, and energy industry, through high-quality products of cast iron and steel.
paragraphs.3: Today, with the launch of the new foundry equipped with the latest global technologies in casting and smelting and international standards in quality and safety, we have succeeded in doubling production capacities and achieving a qualitative shift that qualifies us to compete with major regional and global foundries.
paragraphs.4: We believe that the human element is the real capital of the company, so we pay special attention to qualifying technical and administrative cadres, and applying the latest management and quality systems, ensuring the continuity of our leadership and enhancing our position as a main strategic supplier that can be relied upon.
paragraphs.5: Our vision stems from Egypt Vision 2030, which aims to deepen local manufacturing, localize technology, and achieve self-sufficiency, and we are committed to our national role in this field, through our integration with subsidiaries and the Egyptian industrial sector as a whole.
paragraphs.6: Finally, we look forward to this website being an interactive window to showcase our capabilities and products, and a gateway for communication with our customers and partners, on the path to achieving more shared successes.

ceoMessage.closing: And Allah is the Granter of Success.
